column6: It's the climactic encounter between Blade and his newly-discovered father!  What is Blade's connection to an ancient vampire prophecy and how will it affect him forever?  The answers begin here, true believer!
column8: | inker:Howard Chaykin | colorist:Edgar Delgado | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Marc Guggenheim | letterer:Rus Wooton
